statements: DELETE FROM robotic_arms_sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' AND data_value < 50;
DELETE FROM robotic_arms_sensor_data WHERE id = 1 AND arm_name = 'Arm A';
DELETE FROM robotic_arms_sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' AND data_value > 50.0;
DELETE FROM arm_metrics WHERE arm_id = 2 AND position = 'Holding';
DELETE FROM robotic_arms_data WHERE arm_id = 1 AND sensor_reading < 50.0
DELETE FROM ArmStatus WHERE status LIKE '%offline%';
DELETE FROM SensorData WHERE timestamp < '2021-10-01' AND value < 10.0;
DELETE FROM ArmStatus WHERE status = 'Error' AND last_update < TIMESTAMP '2021-09-15 08:00:00';
